alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 11:59AM AKST until February 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Light snow and blowing snow expected. Additional accumulation of up to one inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will reduce visibility to below a mile at times. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will only gradually improve through the day Saturday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
